if.test: (drugType != null and drugType != '') or (materialType != null and materialType != '')

mapper.select:
select a.item_id as id, a.code,-- 项目编码 a.item_name,-- 项目名称 max(a.item_id) as item_id, a.biz_id,-- 科室id (select bd.name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and a.biz_id = bd.id) as deptName, a.spec,-- 规格 a.curr_unit_code,-- 单位代码（DW） min(a.buy_price) as upSellPrice,-- 零售单价 max(a.buy_price) as buyPrice,-- 购进单价 (select d.buy_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id))as up_buy_price,-- 期初标准零售单价 (select d.buy_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as buy_price,-- 期末零售总金额 (select d.up_surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_surplus_num,-- 本日期初数量 (select d.up_buy_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_buy_price_all,-- 期初零售总金额 (select d.surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as surplus_num,-- 本日期末数量 (select d.buy_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as buy_price_all,-- 本日期末零售总金额 sum(a.stro_in_num) as stro_in_num,-- 药库入库数量 sum(a.stro_in_num_buy_price_all) as stro_in_num_buy_price_all,-- 药库入库购进总金额 sum(a.return_supl_num) as return_supl_num,-- 药库退供应商数量 sum(a.return_supl_buy_price_all) as return_supl_buy_price_all,-- 药库退供应商购进总金额 sum(a.stro_to_phar_num) as stro_to_phar_num,-- 药库出库到药房数量 sum(a.stro_to_phar_buy_price_all) as stro_to_phar_buy_price_all,-- 药库出库到药房购进总金额 sum(a.stro_to_dept_num) as stro_to_dept_num, -- 出库科室数量 sum(a.stro_to_dept_buy_price_all) as stro_to_dept_buy_price_all, -- 出库科室购进价总额 sum(a.phar_return_stro_num) as phar_return_stro_num, -- 药房退库数量 sum(a.phar_return_stro_buy_price_all) as phar_return_stro_buy_price_all, -- 药房退库购进总金额 sum(a.adjust_profit_buy_price_all) as adjust_profit_buy_price_all,-- 调价调盈购进总金额 sum(a.adjust_loss_buy_price_all) as adjust_loss_buy_price_all,-- 调价亏损购进总金额 sum(a.report_losses_num) as report_losses_num,-- 报损消耗数量 sum(a.report_losses_buy_price_all) as report_losses_buy_price_all,-- 报损消耗数量购进总金额 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_num) as take_strock_subtract_num,-- 盘亏数量 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_buy_price_all) as take_strock_subtract_buy_price_all,-- 盘亏购进总金额 sum(a.take_strock_add_num) as take_strock_add_num,-- 盘盈总数量 sum(a.take_strock_add_buy_price_all) as take_strock_add_buy_price_all-- 盘盈购进总金额 from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a
group by a.item_id, a.code, a.item_name, a.biz_id, a.spec, a.curr_unit_code

select a.id, a.code,-- 项目编码 a.item_name,-- 项目名称 a.item_id as item_id, a.biz_id,-- 科室id (select bd.name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and a.biz_id = bd.id) as deptName, a.spec,-- 规格 a.curr_unit_code,-- 单位代码（DW） (select d.sell_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id))as up_sell_price,-- 期初标准零售单价 (select d.sell_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as sell_price,-- 期末零售总金额 (select d.up_surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_surplus_num,-- 本日期初数量 (select d.up_sell_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_sell_price_all,-- 期初零售总金额 (select d.surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as surplus_num,-- 本日期末数量 (select d.sell_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as sell_price_all,-- 本日期末零售总金额 sum(a.stro_in_num) as stro_in_num,-- 药库入库数量 sum(a.stro_in_num_price_all) as stro_in_num_price_all,-- 药库入库零售总金额 sum(a.return_supl_num) as return_supl_num,-- 药库退供应商数量 sum(a.return_supl_price_all) as return_supl_price_all,-- 药库退供应商零售总金额 sum(a.stro_to_phar_num) as stro_to_phar_num,-- 药库出库到药房数量 sum(a.stro_to_phar_price_all) as stro_to_phar_price_all,-- 药库出库到药房零售总金额 sum(a.stro_to_dept_num) as stro_to_dept_num, -- 出库科室数量 sum(a.stro_to_dept_price_all) as stro_to_dept_price_all, -- 出库科室零售价总额 sum(a.phar_return_stro_num) as phar_return_stro_num, -- 药房退库数量 sum(a.phar_return_stro_price_all) as phar_return_stro_price_all, -- 药房退库零售总金额 sum(a.adjust_profit_price_all) as adjust_profit_price_all,-- 调价调盈零售总金额 sum(a.adjust_loss_price_all) as adjust_loss_price_all,-- 调价亏损零售总金额 sum(a.report_losses_num) as report_losses_num,-- 报损消耗数量 sum(a.report_losses_price_all) as report_losses_price_all,-- 报损消耗数量零售总金额 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_num) as take_strock_subtract_num,-- 盘亏数量 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_price_all) as take_strock_subtract_price_all,-- 盘亏零售总金额 sum(a.take_strock_add_num) as take_strock_add_num,-- 盘盈总数量 sum(a.take_strock_add_price_all) as take_strock_add_price_all-- 盘盈零售总金额 from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a
group by a.item_id, a.code, a.item_name, a.biz_id, a.spec

select a.item_id as id, a.code,-- 项目编码 a.item_name,-- 项目名称 max(a.item_id) as item_id, a.biz_id, (select bd.name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and a.biz_id = bd.id) as deptName, a.spec,-- 规格 a.curr_unit_code,-- 单位代码（DW） (select d.buy_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id))as up_buy_price,-- 期初标准零售单价 (select d.buy_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as buy_price,-- 期末零售总金额 (select d.up_surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_surplus_num,-- 本日期初数量 (select d.up_buy_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_buy_price_all,-- 期初零售总金额 (select d.surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as surplus_num,-- 本日期末数量 (select d.buy_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as buy_price_all,-- 本日期末零售总金额 sum(a.phar_in_Num) as phar_in_Num,-- 药库入库数量 sum(a.phar_in_num_buy_price_all) as phar_in_num_buy_price_all,-- 药库入库购进总金额 sum(a.stro_to_dept_num) as stro_to_dept_num,-- 药房出库数量 sum(a.stro_to_dept_buy_price_all) as stro_to_dept_buy_price_all,-- 药房出库到科室购进总金额 sum(a.phar_return_stro_total_num) as phar_return_stro_total_num,-- 药房退库数量 sum(a.phar_return_stro_buy_pri_all) as phar_return_stro_buy_pri_all,-- 药房退库购进总金额 sum(a.out_sales_num) as out_sales_num,-- 门诊销售数量 sum(a.out_sales_buy_price_all) as out_sales_buy_price_all,-- 门诊销售购进总金额 sum(a.in_sales_num) as in_sales_num,-- 住院销售数量 sum(a.in_sales_buy_price_all) as in_sales_buy_price_all,-- 住院销售购进总金额 sum(a.report_losses_num) as report_losses_num,-- 报损消耗数量 sum(a.report_losses_buy_price_all) as report_losses_buy_price_all,-- 报损消耗数量购进总金额 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_num) as take_strock_subtract_num,-- 盘亏数量 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_buy_price_all) as take_strock_subtract_buy_price_all,-- 盘亏购进总金额 sum(a.take_strock_add_num) as take_strock_add_num,-- 盘盈总数量 sum(a.take_strock_add_buy_price_all) as take_strock_add_buy_price_all,-- 盘盈购进总金额 sum(a.adjust_profit_buy_price_all) as adjust_profit_buy_price_all,-- 调价调盈购进总金额 sum(a.adjust_loss_buy_price_all) as adjust_loss_buy_price_all-- 调价亏损购进总金额 from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a
group by a.item_id, a.code, a.item_name, a.biz_id, a.spec

select a.item_id as id, a.code,-- 项目编码 a.item_name,-- 项目名称 max(a.item_id) as item_id, a.biz_id,-- 科室id (select bd.name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and a.biz_id = bd.id) as deptName, a.spec,-- 规格 a.curr_unit_code,-- 单位代码（DW） (select d.sell_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id))as up_sell_price,-- 期初标准零售单价 (select d.sell_price from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as sell_price,-- 期末零售总金额 (select d.up_surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_surplus_num,-- 本日期初数量 (select d.up_sell_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = min(a.id)) as up_sell_price_all,-- 期初零售总金额 (select d.surplus_num from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as surplus_num,-- 本日期末数量 (select d.sell_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail d where d.item_id = a.item_id and d.id = max(a.id)) as sell_price_all,-- 本日期末零售总金额 sum(a.phar_in_Num) as phar_in_Num,-- 药库入库数量 sum(a.phar_in_num_buy_price_all) as phar_in_num_buy_price_all,-- 药库入库零售总金额 sum(a.stro_to_dept_num) as stro_to_dept_num,-- 药房出库数量 sum(a.stro_to_dept_price_all) as stro_to_dept_price_all,-- 药房出库到科室零售总金额 sum(a.phar_return_stro_total_num) as phar_return_stro_total_num,-- 药房退库数量 sum(a.phar_return_stro_buy_pri_all) as phar_return_stro_buy_pri_all,-- 药房退库零售总金额 sum(a.out_sales_num) as out_sales_num,-- 门诊销售数量 sum(a.out_sales_price_all) as out_sales_price_all,-- 门诊销售零售总金额 sum(a.in_sales_num) as in_sales_num,-- 住院销售数量 sum(a.in_sales_price_all) as in_sales_price_all,-- 住院销售零售总金额 sum(a.report_losses_num) as report_losses_num,-- 报损消耗数量 sum(a.report_losses_price_all) as report_losses_price_all,-- 报损消耗数量零售总金额 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_num) as take_strock_subtract_num,-- 盘亏数量 sum(a.take_strock_subtract_price_all) as take_strock_subtract_price_all,-- 盘亏零售总金额 sum(a.take_strock_add_num) as take_strock_add_num,-- 盘盈总数量 sum(a.take_strock_add_price_all) as take_strock_add_price_all,-- 盘盈零售总金额 sum(a.adjust_profit_price_all) as adjust_profit_price_all,-- 调价调盈零售总金额 sum(a.adjust_loss_price_all) as adjust_loss_price_all-- 调价亏损零售总金额 from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a
group by a.item_id, a.code, a.item_name, a.biz_id, a.spec

select a.id, hosp_code, biz_id, (select bd.name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and a.biz_id = bd.id) as deptName, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, unit_code, curr_unit_code, sell_price, buy_price, sell_price as up_sell_price, buy_price as up_buy_price, split_ratio, split_price, split_num, split_unit_code, surplus_num, buy_price_all, sell_price_all from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a,(select max(id) as id from extract_stro_invoicing_detail a
and a.biz_id = #{bizId}
and ((a.item_code = '1' and a.item_type = #{drugType}) or (a.item_code = '2'and a.item_type = #{materialType}))
and (a.item_name like '%${keyWord}%')
group by a.item_id, a.code, a.item_name, a.biz_id, a.spec) b where b.id = a.id
